name: Hamsters in a Mech
description:
Ludum Dare 47- Stuck in a Loop

Manage a group of cute hamster beans powering a (sorta) giant hamster mech! In the mech, you run on an even bigger hamster wheel, but are under attack by bug-like aliens. Rotate the shield wheel to defend from their attacks, and rotate the aim and fire wheel to shoot them down! Get through as many rotations of the wheel as you can before the aliens take you out.

Controls:

Tap on a hamster wheel to make the hamster go faster.

Drag two hamsters into a heart to make them fall in love and have a baby.

Drag hamsters between different wheels to give them different jobs.

Click on a hamster to see its stats,
